segments.text: I wonder if we can change to Channel 5 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to know what's on that channel .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I prefer TV play to football .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Could you turn it down ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you going to do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to listen to the radio .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe we can enjoy the TV play together . It's interesting .
segments.speaker: S2
